abstract: Air France tells customers via email that violent, clothes-ripping protests against carrier's executives over job cuts should not hurt its reputation.
lead_paragraph: Air France sent an unusual appeal Friday to its passengers worldwide, insisting that the violent, clothes-ripping protests against executives earlier should not scar the airline’s reputation.

headline.main: After Clothes-Shreddings, Air France Asks for Trust
headline.print_headline: After Clothes-Shreddings, Air France Asks for Trust

snippet: Air France sent an unusual appeal Friday to its passengers worldwide, insisting that the violent, clothes-ripping protests against executives earlier should not scar the airline’s reputation.
